item.title: Paul add a quote by Paul Theroux
item.description: "You go away for a long time and return a different person - you never come all the way back." -- Paul Theroux

item.title: Paul add a quote by Peter Matthiessen
item.description: "It is related that Sakyamuni [the historical Buddha] once dismissed as of small consequence a feat of levitation on the part of a disciple, and cried out in pity for a yogin by the river who had spent twenty years of his human existence learning to walk on water, when the ferryman might have taken him across for a small coin." -- Peter Matthiessen

item.title: Paul add a quote by Niels Bohr
item.description: "An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field." -- Niels Bohr
